title: Too hot for comfort: The physiological dangers of extreme heat

title_detail.value: Too hot for comfort: The physiological dangers of extreme heat

summary: A new review of more than 140 studies explores the physiological dangers that climate change will likely have on animal life, including humans.

summary_detail.value: A new review of more than 140 studies explores the physiological dangers that climate change will likely have on animal life, including humans.
